sentences: Hayato Ichihara (市原 隼人, Ichihara Hayato, February 6, 1987) is a Japanese actor who is best known for his roles in film and television, including the 2001 film All About Lily Chou-Chou.
In 2009 he was voted one of Oricon's "fresh Stars" of the year.
In 2009 he was also voted the 4th most attractive male celebrity in a swimsuit.
In 2011 in a poll by NTT DoCoMo
